metadata.title: JAMSTEC Sea Bottom Gamma Ray Data Base
metadata.description: To understand changes in the deep seafloor from the past to present, and the relationship between physical, chemical, biological, and geological phenomena accompanying those changes, with the hope of furthering our comprehensive understanding of deep-sea mechanisms.
metadata.notes:
